#include <stdio.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 #define gc getchar_unlocked
 void read(int &);
 
int main()
{
  int x, c, k,count=0;
  read(x);
  
 //salman ka fan
 
  for (c = 31; c >= 0; c--)
  {
    k = x >> c;
 
    if (k & 1)
      count++;
    else{}
     // printf("0");
  }////mai to superman hihahahaahahahahaa
 
  printf("%d\n",count);
 
  return 0;
}
inline void read(int &x){

        x=0;
        register char c=gc();
        for(;c<'0' || c>'9';c=gc());
         for(;c>='0' && c<='9';c=gc())
          x=(x<<3)+(x<<1)+(c-'0');
      }
